description:
Automatically detect potential duplicate entities across types (especially persons and organizations) using fuzzy matching on names, dates, and attributes. Provide a merge interface that intelligently combines relationships, preserves history, and redirects references.

**Rationale:** Data quality degrades over time as multiple users create similar entities. Duplicate detection prevents fragmented relationship graphs and ensures accurate reporting, which is critical for tracking engagements and commitments in government affairs.
title: Cross-Entity Duplicate Detection and Merge
